title: CIPET Recruitment 2026 - Apply Online for 11 Manager and Other Posts
description: Central Institute of Plastics Engineering & Technology (CIPET) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for 11 Manager and Senior Technical Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech, Ph.D, or any degree can grab this chance and apply for the CIPET Recruitment 2026 . Here we mentioned more details about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested ...
